show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Menace Of Crass Ignorance In High Places

title: The Menace Of Crass Ignorance In High Places
content:
QE (”quantitative easing”) or money-printing is over. The evidence comes from Japan but is being admitted almost openly in US financial circles.
An abject failure.
A terrible experiment gone awry.
And its demented creator scurries around the country picking up $75,000 to $250,000 fees for “lecturing” the country.
Listen to a scathing critique from William White, ex-chief economist for the BIS, the central bank of central banks.
“Freedom” in the US is now relative.
Innocent until proven guilty?
Not so much.
Janet Yellen thinks “full employment” is just around the corner.
Poor, misguided moron.
More on Europe’s problems.
Utter disillusionment about the political process on the part of the American public.
The art of forecasting.
Family Dollar and Coldwater Creek bite the dust.
